task.title: Installing and configuring the cluster management software

taskbody.context: Perform this procedure to install and configure the cluster management software.

step.cmd: Log in to the primary node .
In a separate window, log in to the secondary node .
On both nodes, install the cluster management software.
On both nodes, install the Pacemaker resource agent for .
step.info: Pacemaker uses resource agents (scripts) to implement a standardized interface for managing arbitrary resources in a cluster. provides a Pacemaker resource agent to manage the master host in a high-availability cluster.

step.cmd: On both nodes, start and enable the PCS daemon.

stepxmp.codeblock: systemctl start pcsd.service && systemctl enable pcsd.service

step.cmd: On both nodes, set the password of the hacluster account.
step.info: The Pacemaker package creates the hacluster user account, which must have the same password on both nodes.
